question.title: Java (Minecraft Modding) Nullpoint Exception and Initiation error when trying to make a item on fabric
question.body:
I am currently working on a fabric 1.21.5 Minecraft mod while somewhat following a Youtube tutorial after making an item I run the client and after building it just crashes with 3 errors.

Caused by: java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError

Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException: Item id not set

Process 'command 'C:\Program Files\Eclipse Adoptium\jdk-21.0.7.6-hotspot\bin\java.exe' finished with non-zero exit value -1'

im pretty sure that the first and last one are generic error codes but I could be wrong.

I looked around my code but IntelliJ did not find any errors, so then I asked Github Copilot but Copilot being Copilot it just blames me using Identifier.of instead of just Identifier but when I do what Copilot wants me to do Gradle and IntelliJ say that it is wrong.
